name: Gun Slime
description:
Gunslime is a 2D Platformer featuring a Slime...

...with a gun.

Traverse through 16 Levels across 4 areas, using your trusty Pistol for an extra jump. Reload by touching the ground, bouncing off a mushroom, or catching a bullet mid-air. 

While exploring the 4 areas, you may encounter dangerous obstacles, from spikes to lava and even falling rocks. Lava will give you a boost of speed upwards, but will disable your gun until you touch the ground again. Landing in Lava again before touching the ground will be fatal. Touching spikes or falling rocks will also be fatal.

Can you successfully navigate these obstacles and reach the top of  Mt.Combustion?
